title: Number of active physicians in California 2019 , by specialty area
summary: The Number active Specialty in the California 2019 was Specialty Anesthesiologists , who made 58771 physicians .
The most active Specialty was Radiology , with just 822 physicians .

In second place was Specialty Surgery with 5367 physicians ; third place went to Specialty Psychiatry with 7288 physicians ; fourth place went to Specialty Total_specialty with 58771 physicians and fifth place went to Specialty Emergency_medicine , who was 6050 physicians .
gold: This statistic depicts the number of active physicians in California as of March 2019 , ordered by their specialty area . At that time , there were 6,098 anesthesiologists active in California . There are over 58,000 active physicians in the state .
